titleStmt.title: Saving-beliefe: or, The ready and right vvay to beleeve and be saved Wherein is the * mysterie of faith laid open * I Tim. 3. 9. By Timothy Rogers, minister of the Gospel (twixt Essex and Suffolke) in Sudbury.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Timothy, 1598-1650?.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by G.M. for Edward Brewster at the Bible on Fleet-bridge,

notesStmt.note: The words "* I Tim. 3. 9." on title page are enclosed in square brackets.
Caption title on p. 1 reads: Saving belief: or, The ready and right way to beleeve and be saved.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
